```{r}

total.casos<-
  svyby(~MOV_PTV_e1_2, by=~DEPARTAMEN, design =df, FUN=svytotal, vartype=c('se','ci')) %>% 
  
  data.frame() %>%
  
  mutate(casos.mov.ptv= MOV_PTV_e1_2) %>% 
    
  select(-MOV_PTV_e1_2)





total.dep<-svytotal(~DEPARTAMEN,df) %>% 
  
  data.frame() %>% 
  
  bind_cols(MOV2020_2$DEPARTAMEN %>% unique()) %>% 
  
  mutate(DEPARTAMEN = ...3) %>% select(-...3)



total.dep2<-total.casos %>% full_join(total.dep, by = "DEPARTAMEN") %>% 
  
  select(DEPARTAMEN,total,casos.mov.ptv) %>% 
  
  mutate(prop.share= casos.mov.ptv/sum(total))
  
total.dep2 %>% arrange()
```
